thread.title: Luz Cruz

author: Luz Cruz
title: Luz Cruz
text: Biblio is a good application and useful if you are looking for cheapest books. Unfortunately, there are sellers that say has the book but the reality they haven't it. So, you pay for the book and wait and wait and wait for almost 4 weeks and "nothing". Then you contact the seller asking what happen with your book and their answer is: "apparently the book iwas lost in the mail, we will return your money in 72 hours". ðŸ˜¡ Honestly, I don't belief that big lie.
